resources.string: 1941. You are a private soldier in USA army. You will get your mission objectives from Captain Miller. He is waiting for you near the aircraft.
Your mission, code-named Black Valkyrie, is to gather vital intelligence on enemy operations and disrupt their plans.
Commander: Hey, private! What are you doing? Come here .

You have been dropped behind enemy lines with minimal equipment and must rely on your skills and instincts to survive. The success of this mission could turn the tide of the war. Choose your next move wisely:
